meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one trillionth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the tiny virus using picometers.
meanings.sent2: In atomic physics, researchers often work with measurements in picometers.
meanings.sent3: The picometers were so small that even the ants couldn't see them!
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was as precise as a picometer.
meanings.sent5: The picometers were like invisible threads connecting the atoms.
